credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Rough Sketch of Tree and Sky (Recto); Rough Ocean on Cliff (Verso)
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
description:
Recto: At left, single dark tree under rough, dark sky.
Verso: Rough ocean in foreground with cliff, at right, in midground.
name: Sketchbook folio
